price: Indeed, there is a sign in this, yet most of them will not believe.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
